text: Saint Thomas is an island in the Caribbean Sea. It is a county and constituent district of the United States Virgin Islands (USVI). The territorial capital and port of Charlotte Amalie is on the island. As of the 2020 census, Saint Thomas had 42,261 people, about 48% of the US Virgin Islands total. title: Saint Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands
